Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at InterCityHotel Berlin Hauptbahnhof places you in the heart of Berlin, minutes from German Chancellery and close to Reichstag Building. This 4-star hotel is close to Brandenburg Gate and Checkpoint Charlie Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 412 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and shopping on site.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of InterCityHotel Berlin Hauptbahnhof. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in Berlin? This hotel has 5541 square feet (515 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of InterCityHotel Berlin Hauptbahnhof. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at InterCityHotel Berlin Hauptbahnhof places you in the heart of Berlin, minutes from German Chancellery and close to Reichstag Building. This 4-star hotel is close to Brandenburg Gate and Checkpoint Charlie Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

German Chancellery - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
House of World Cultures - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Museum for Contemporary Art - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Reichstag Building - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Charite - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Tiergarten Soviet War Memorial - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Deutsches Theater - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Brandenburg Gate - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Humboldt Museum of Natural History - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Parisier Platz - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Bellevue Palace - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Madame Tussauds - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Berliner Ensemble - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Theater am Schiffbauerdamm - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Friedrichstadt-Palast - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 17.9 km / 11.1 mi

The preferred airport for InterCityHotel Berlin Hauptbahnhof is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
